full_summary:
================
### RFAP for Energy Consulting Services Source List

**Notice Number:** MX-22597039222
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** October 18, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** Not specified

**Description:**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is soliciting abbreviated proposals from consulting firms to establish a Source List (SL) for energy-related consulting services. The SL will be used to provide professional services on an as-needed basis to support Department of National Defence (DND) activities.

**Regions and Estimated Values:**

* Pacific Region (British Columbia):
	+ Maximum estimated value: $2.7 million over 3 years
	+ Potential extension: + $900,000 for up to 1 additional year
* Prairies Region (Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba):
	+ Maximum estimated value: $3.9 million over 3 years
	+ Potential extension: + $1.3 million for up to 1 additional year

**Commissions:**

* Expected values: between $50,000 and $250,000
* Maximum value: $350,000

**Bidding and Documents:**

The RFAP document and bidding process are available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; consult [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for details.

**Notice URL:**

* English: <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2322654921/abstract?language=EN>
* French: <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2322654921/abstract?language=FR>

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Keltie Leger
* Email: [keltie.leger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:keltie.leger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-542-5027

I have removed irrelevant and redundant information, rephrased sentences for clarity and concision, and used formal language throughout the rewritten entry. I have also preserved all the essential details and information as specified in the original text. Let me know if you would like me to make any adjustments or further changes!
